item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to Avo Sites. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Contact form 1
item.dc:creator: maxpen969
item.content:encoded:
<label> Your name [text* your-name] </label>
<label> Your email [email* your-email] </label>
<label> Subject [text* your-subject] </label>
<label> Your message (optional) [textarea your-message] </label>
[submit "Submit"] [_site_title] "[your-subject]" [_site_title] <wordpress@avotheme.smartinnovates.com> From: [your-name] <[your-email]> Subject: [your-subject]
Message Body: [your-message]
-- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on [_site_title] ([_site_url]) [_site_admin_email] Reply-To: [your-email]

The field is too short.

item.title: avo-contact
item.dc:creator: maxpen969
item.content:encoded:
[text* your-name placeholder "Your Name..." ]
[tel* cell-phone placeholder "Cell Phone..." ]

[email* your-email placeholder "Email Address..."]
[text* subject placeholder "Subject..." ]

[textarea your-message placeholder "Your Message"]

[submit "Send Message"]

1 [_site_title] "[your-subject]" [_site_title] [_site_admin_email] From: [your-name] <[your-email]> Subject: [your-subject] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on [_site_title] ([_site_url]) Reply-To: [your-email] [_site_title] "[your-subject]" [_site_title] [your-email] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on [_site_title] ([_site_url]) Reply-To: [_site_admin_email] Thank you for your message. It has been sent. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. One or more fields have an error. Please check and try again. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. You must accept the terms and conditions before sending your message. The field is required. The field is too long. The field is too short. The date format is incorrect. The date is before the earliest one allowed. The date is after the latest one allowed. There was an unknown error uploading the file. You are not allowed to upload files of this type.
